post:
HostRound LLC is a is a US-based hosting company its founders have a passion to provide better hosting solutions and the level of support that you deserve.

VPS hosting is the latest addition to our product lineup, offering an excellent alternative for anyone that needs a light, moderate or even intensive traffic solution.
VPS Hosting is the best affordable solution for a fully controlled and powerful hosting environment.

Why HostRound VPS Hosting?
- Kernel-based virtualization for full isolation and limitless power.
- Intel Xeon E5 CPUs (Up to 4GHz/15M Cache/Core)
- Pure SAMSUNG SSD storage (20x I/O speed)
- High-availability servers (99.99% Uptime)
- 24/7 Premium Support
- FREE 3Gbps DDoS Protection (Upgradable to 500Gbps)
- Free Server Management (cPanel Only)
- Full root Access
- Wide range of Operating Systems (Linux & Windows)
- High Availability, Connectivity failover, and Tier-1 Carriers.
- All incoming bandwidth is free on every VPS
- Tier-III Datacenters
- Full-featured, Easy and Elegant VPS management panel.
- 30-day Money back guarantee
- A wide range of add-ons available to your VPS
Read more about VPS Hosting by HostRound



Get $5 Discount on any VPS plan with a 30-Day money back guarantee.
